title: Colourful male fish have genes to thank for their enduring looks

title_detail.value: Colourful male fish have genes to thank for their enduring looks

summary: Striking colors that are seen only in the males of some species are partly explained by gene behavior, research into guppy fish suggests.

summary_detail.value: Striking colors that are seen only in the males of some species are partly explained by gene behavior, research into guppy fish suggests.
